feed.title: Postiz Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Postiz: New Social Networks, bug fixes, mintor fixes
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Added Bluesky, Mastodon, Slack and Discord channels ‚ù§Ô∏èüöÄ
  • docs: update CONTRIBUTING.md by @eltociear in https://github.com/gitroomhq/postiz-app/pull/265
  • fix: Improve Remove Icon and Toast Text Visibility in light mode by @JeevaRamanathan in https://github.com/gitroomhq/postiz-app/pull/294
  • fix: Checkbox tick visible on both modes by @JeevaRamanathan in https://github.com/gitroomhq/postiz-app/pull/269
  • Fixed üêõ Bug Report : Profile Settings UI errors [fixed : #301] by @prathamesh424 in https://github.com/gitroomhq/postiz-app/pull/302
  • fix: updated faq descriptions by @JeevaRamanathan in https://github.com/gitroomhq/postiz-app/pull/308
  • Create SECURITY.md by @Vignesh025 in https://github.com/gitroomhq/postiz-app/pull/299
  • doc: Update CONTRIBUTING.md by @AkashJana18 in https://github.com/gitroomhq/postiz-app/pull/286
  • fix:Change button cursor to pointer on hover by @Mujtaba500 in https://github.com/gitroomhq/postiz-app/pull/311
  • doc: The pull request template needs a checklist to avoid common issues [skip ci] by @jamesread in https://github.com/gitroomhq/postiz-app/pull/314
  • Updated button style to rounded edges by @Zor0000 in https://github.com/gitroomhq/postiz-app/pull/274
  • ci: Add /uploads to Docker containers [skip ci] by @jamesread in https://github.com/gitroomhq/postiz-app/pull/315

New Contributors

  • @JeevaRamanathan made their first contribution in https://github.com/gitroomhq/postiz-app/pull/294
  • @prathamesh424 made their first contribution in https://github.com/gitroomhq/postiz-app/pull/302
  • @Vignesh025 made their first contribution in https://github.com/gitroomhq/postiz-app/pull/299
  • @AkashJana18 made their first contribution in https://github.com/gitroomhq/postiz-app/pull/286
  • @Mujtaba500 made their first contribution in https://github.com/gitroomhq/postiz-app/pull/311
  • @Zor0000 made their first contribution in https://github.com/gitroomhq/postiz-app/pull/274

Full Changelog: https://github.com/gitroomhq/postiz-app/compare/v1.4.0...v1.5.0

entry.title: New release for Postiz: Local uploading, and minor fixes
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix: path of contributing guide in PULL_REQUEST_TEMPLATE.md by @JeevaRamanathan in https://github.com/gitroomhq/postiz-app/pull/320
  • Proxy /uploads in containers by @jamesread in https://github.com/gitroomhq/postiz-app/pull/326
  • feature/media uploader by @SanadKhan in https://github.com/gitroomhq/postiz-app/pull/327
  • doc: Update CONTRIBUTING.md to point to Developer Guide [skip ci] by @jamesread in https://github.com/gitroomhq/postiz-app/pull/330
  • Fix variables injections when building a docker by @nevo-david in https://github.com/gitroomhq/postiz-app/pull/335

Full Changelog: https://github.com/gitroomhq/postiz-app/compare/v1.5.0...1.6.0
